reviews.review:
Моя первая игра  в Steam.
Я поклонник игр в жанре головоломка и студии Valve.
Однажды я создам свою игру в жанре головоломка.

this game is rly good but i hate the british wheat ball he scares me so much he came into chells room and scream FISH AND CHIPS at her cuz hes british and thats what they all sound like did you know theirs no air conditioning in britain? wow british people can afford dragons and castles and universal healthcare but they cant even cool down there own houses. i think that is y wheat thin try to kill shell he wants her air conditioning. i think the world would be so much better if britain didnt exist im just a dumbass kid but even im smarter than most british people my house is cool in the summer. but is  really good game
Отличная игра, которая помогает во развитие внимательности, сюжет интересный, но интереснее всего играть в двоем с другом. Вообщем советую
Решил купить вторую часть из-за онлайн режима. Не жалею очень интересная игра.
şu ana kadar gördüğüm en yaratıcı konuya sahip ve ayrıca ucuzda.kesinlikle almanızı tavsiye ederim
I never played a game that made me feel so stupid, but so powerful at the same time. 10/5 stars heavily recommend.
再次被震撼，难以想象这是十年前的游戏，不知道几刷了还是好玩，那就再玩一遍吧！
Will there be a Portal 3?  It is my favorite game.
Very fun. Like Fireboy and Watergirl but 3D and with RTX on!
EU ACHO QUE É UM JOGO
One of my favorite games of all time. PLEASE play this if you have not already!!!

Gra absolutnie wybitna.
Bałem się tej części, po jedynce która zrobiła na mnie piorunujące wrażenie, moje oczekiwania były wysokie. Okazało się jednak, że moje oczekiwania zostały przebite co najmniej kilka razy.
Grałem w tyle gier, że mało która jest w stanie mnie czymkolwiek zaskoczyć, jednak Portal zaskakuje i to za każdym razem pozytywnie.
Bardzo podobała mi się koncepcja gry logicznej z dużym naciskiem na fabułę, a w części drugiej fabuły tej jest dużo dużo więcej, jest dużo bardziej rozwinięta, ale dzięki doskonałej narracji nie przytłacza i przez całą grę wszystko jest jasne, nie ma żadnych dziur, ani żadnych niedomówień. Bohaterowie są bardzo dobrze napisani i zapadają w pamięć, każdy dialog jest przemyślany, a sama gra ani przez chwilę nie męczy, mimo bycia grą logiczną.

10/10 - wszystko w tej grze chodzi jak w szwajcarskim zegarku, nie jestem w stanie się do czegokolwiek przyczepić.
This is pretty much the best game I've ever played. The puzzles are challenging but not too hard and the scenery is very immersive.
me gusta cuando se le peude ver el culo a la chica
Top 3 best games I've ever played.
The portal series is a master piece

El juego me gusto mucho la verdad porque metieron muchas cosas como por ejemplos puzzles mas complejos , logros mas desafiantes ,sus dialogos de glados resentida XD, nuevo modo cooperativo (te recomiendo terminar su historia  en primer lugar )  ,sountrack ( que por cierto es gratis ) y para concluir te recomiendo comprarlo en descuento
This is literally the best game i ever played, excellent from every aspect!

Fucking great game. Buy it. I mean seriously, what is not to like? Haha it is a little dated? No. Well... only graphics wise. Great story line and awesome gameplay. Really, there is nothing to fear. Cough up the dough and just buy the damn game. 5/5 stars.
güzel ama benim beyin bazen yetmiyor

super fun valve game, once again
i hope they make a third one :)

My Partner in Science and I Revisited Again in 2021

And we discovered that we are way too dumber than before.

I love this game! Its a great mix of story and puzzle, and the Co-Op Play is awesome! The only thing i wish it had was hints for when I get stuck. Luckily, there are plenty of walk-throughs online. Regardless, i'd 10/10 recommend this game!
Portal but better in almost every way, still one of the best valve and in general best games of all time only downside is the MANY loading screens
Tristan is bad ong but game is fun

Outstanding gameplay, perfect multiplayer and all around a very IMMENSE experience, the relationship between P-body and Atlas is something better than twilight itself, I'm very glad to have played this game and bought it twice, if you have not seen this game, you've truly never seen god material.
Cake, and grief counseling, will be available at the conclusion of the test...
Лучшая головоломка, в которую я когда-либо играл. Но все равно короткая...
good puzzels chapters 6 and 7 kinda boring
jogo muito bom tem que quebrar a cabeça um pouco em alguns puzzles e é um jogo muito divertido para jogar com amigos

Игра не возможная в современной игровой индустрии!) Перед вами трёхмерная AAA головоломка с великолепным сюжетом, прекрасными персонажами, отличным юмором!) Законченное полноценное произведение!) Рекомендую всем!)

boy am i GLAD(os) this game is over hahahahahahah

nah but for real tho i love this game
除了牛逼我想不出其他词来形容这游戏
An awesome puzzle story game, my brain is starting to get a bit melted on these puzzles.

I played the original Portal and loved the original game. I was skeptical of the sequel (Portal 2), because I thought was gonna be a cash grab. I was wrong! The sequel's graphics are amazing despite that the game came out in 2012. The game is charming with puzzles, laughs and fun times! I give Portal 2 a 10/10!
the cake is a lie, but GLaDOS still loves you <3
神作，只能说是非常好玩！
My favorit valv gaym. Very nice and gud. I like robut lady return and new fottbal freind call wheat. I recomeanded

Portal 2 is a great puzzle solving game that tests your skills. Unlike Portal it also has a multiplayer mode where you can solve puzzles with your friends. I think thats a great addition to the game. Like the first Portal it only has few hours of gameplay. Overall its a great game to play after work/school.

highly reccomend
very fun

romance (joking)
funny
cool puzzles
yes

the only two things that bothered me was:
motion blur, i couldnt figure out how to turn it off, but i got used to it after a while
it doesnt tell you where you can and cant place portals

other than that i would rate this game 11/10 would highly reccomend

one of the most overrated games ever

游戏关卡设计的天花板。
本来作为一名车抢球还好者，对这类烧脑游戏可以说是不感兴趣，但传送门2只通过简单的两个传送门和复杂精密的关卡设计给我带来解密过关的乐趣，特别是每次想出解法后的那种成就感给了我一口气通关游戏的动力。
但这游戏也有点缺点，玩久了费脑头疼。QAQ
The story is great and the puzzles are annoying but satisfying to solve
